creator: Merger IO
descriptionHtml:
Make your photo collage attractive with funky stickers, filters, neons and text.

Collage maker is a perfect app for creating collage with multiple grids. This app is built with userfriendly interface, supporting variety of features like, photo collage maker, free style collages,
artsy filters, funky stickers, neons, doodle and much more.

Collage maker is ready to give you best editing experience for free.
Key Features

1. Photo Collage Maker and editor
Take your creativity to a new level!
Collage maker lets you create attractive photo collage with multiple grid style. You can design any of your favourite layouts and design your photos into an incredible social media post.

2. Artsy Filters
Collage maker supports photo editor and collage maker functionality along with appealing filters.
You can apply attractive filters to your photos according to your preference.

3. Funky Stickers
Show what you feel with stickers!
Collage maker lets you apply stickers to your photo collage so that you can make your picture more appealing to your audience.

4. Free style Collage
Create free style collage for free!
Collage maker lets you make free style collage with beautiful background, borders, stickers, text and much more.

You can design beautiful collage without any grid style you want.

5. Neon Effects
Collage maker supports neon effects and this feature lets you edit your photo collage with Neon light effects that makes your photos more fascinating.

6. Add Text
Share what you feel through Message!
Collage maker lets you add text to your photo collage. You can give stunning look to your text with a visually appealing font.

With Collage maker, you can express your thoughts, feeling through text and this will help you to make your photos picture perfect.

Required Permissions:
“READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE”
“WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE”
The sole reason we are asking for these permissions is so that we can offer the best editing experience possible. We respect the privacy of our users, so we do not allow any misuse of these permissions.

We would love to hear feedback from your end and you can share it freely through reviews and ratings

💖 Make your photo collage attractive with funky stickers, filters, neons, and text. 💖



Collage maker is a perfect app for creating collage with multiple photo grids. This app is built with userfriendly interface, supporting a variety of features like side by side picture, photo editor collage maker, pic grid maker, and free style collages, artsy filters, funky stickers, neons, doodle, and much more.

👉 Photo Grid Collage maker is ready to give you the best editing experience for free.

Key Features:


⭐ Photo Editor Collage Maker
Take your creativity to a new level!
Pic Collage maker lets you create an attractive photo collage editor with multiple grid style. You can design any of your favorite layouts and design your photos into an incredible social media post.

⭐ Artsy Filters
Pic Collage Maker supports photo editor and collage maker functionality along with appealing filters. You can apply attractive filters to your photos according to your preference.

⭐ Funky Stickers
Show what you feel with stickers!
Picture Collage maker lets you apply stickers to your photo collage so that you can make your picture more appealing to your audience.

⭐ Free style Collage
Create free style collage for free!
Picture Collage maker lets you make free style collage with beautiful background, borders, stickers, text, and much more.
You can design a beautiful collage without any grid style you want.

⭐ Neon Effects
Collage maker supports neon effects and this feature lets you edit your photo collage creator with Neon light effects that makes your photos more fascinating.

⭐ Add Text
Share what you feel through Message!
Collage maker lets you add text to your photo collage creator. You can give stunning look to your text with a visually appealing font.
With Picture Collage maker, you can express your thoughts, feeling through text and this will help you to make your photos picture perfect.

👉 Required Permissions:
“READ_EXTERNAL_STORAGE”
“WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE”
The sole reason we are asking for these permissions is so that we can offer the best editing experience possible. We respect the privacy of our users, so we do not allow any misuse of these permissions.

It is noted that our app is not sponsored or affiliated with Facebook, YouTube and Instagram, and other social sites in any manner.

🔥

👍 We would love to hear feedback from your end and you can share it freely through reviews
and ratings.
